name: Cyclone Dash
description:
Severe weather advisory!

A mad storm is raging and the howling wind whips in your face.
But that is the least of your worries! Boxes, cars, chairs, explosive barrels, tires and lots of other objects are flying towards you from the eye of the storm. How long can you last until your screen is getting shattered ?

-Simple, fun and addictive swipe gameplay made for a touchscreen.
-3D graphics with Retina display support.
-Amazing effects and physics powered by the Unreal Engine.
-Watch your screen getting smashed by many different objects.
-Skill based scoring with criticals, bonuses and extra lifes.
-Game Center Leaderboards and Achievements.
-Universal App for IPhone, IPod, IPad.

The calm before the storm is over...
